definition: to begin to stir (idiom)/to get restless/to become threatening
stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion
variant of 蠢[chun3]/stupid
stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion
variant of 蠢[chun3]/stupid
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]
desire/appetite/passion/lust/greed
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Investors are obviously skittish, and small, new companies suffer in recessionary times.
sentences.chinese: 投资者蠢蠢欲动，而新的小公司受困于经济萧条时期。

sentences.english: In fact, when a person, the heart is aching and tears ready for it.
sentences.chinese: 其实一个人的时候，心在隐隐作痛，泪在蠢蠢欲动。

sentences.english: Just married man still eager for action, or strong had strong to be another matter.
sentences.chinese: 只是已婚男子还蠢蠢欲动，或强占强霸就另当别论了。

sentences.english: After a few days, of ready to do sth we try again, still be to part on bad terms.
sentences.chinese: 几天后，蠢蠢欲动的我们再次尝试，依然是不欢而散。

sentences.english: And all this, but it gave the budding Lin Wu thing a great opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 而这一切，却给了蠢蠢欲动的林午阳一个绝好的机会。

definition: to be eager to give sth a try (idiom)
to stir restlessly/to be agitated/commotion/agitation
to be unable to hold back
restless/unsettled
fig. to rub one's fists and wipe one's palms (idiom)/to roll up one's sleeves for battle/eager to get into action or start on a task
to glare like a tiger watching his prey (idiom)/to eye covetously
to covet/to long for/to lust after
lit. to sharpen one's sword (idiom)/fig. to prepare to attack/to be getting ready for battle
to water at the mouth/to drool
lit. lay down the flag and still the drums (idiom); fig. to cease/to give in
impatient (idiom); in a hurry/itching to get on with it
to entice/to arouse/to provoke
unwilling to remain lonely or idle/unwilling to be left out
to wait for action after having accumulated power, energy etc
to agitate/to arouse/to instigate/to encite
unable to wait
